::Spears::

She looked at Striker, "Please, please do as Master Prebon asks. He 
said he would let you go after he had simply erased your memory of 
this place.  Please do as he asks."  She looked at Prebon. "Don't 
hurt him. Ramulus may not come if your hostage is damaged. And once 
his memory is earsed, he won't be of any help to them."

Her spark still felt love for Striker even if the rest of her was now 
belonging to Prebon.  She couldn't help but feel compasion for 
Striker, despite the chip.

"Master, please, I don't wish to die. Please don't order me to self 
destruct."  She turned and looked at Striker again.  She was having a 
hard time seeing him tied up and kept in a cage.  She looked down and 
let a tear roll down her cheek as she closed her eyes.
